splash.description: Your first companion for organizing medication schedules and taking care of your health.

onboarding.sub_title1: Don't miss a dose again. Get accurate and direct alerts for your medication times and stay up-to-date with your health schedule.
onboarding.sub_title2: Join studies or register your health attendance easily. Just scan the QR code and you'll be ready to go in seconds.
onboarding.sub_title3: Understand your health more deeply. Receive personalized tips and statistics based on your data and daily progress.

login.description: Login to keep track of your appointments.

about_app.title: About the App
about_app.hero_subtitle: Your doctor at the tap of a button ‚ö°
about_app.intro_desc: Fast Booking is your easiest digital gateway to connect with elite doctors across the Kingdom. We are here to shorten your wait time and elevate your healthcare experience to align with Vision 2030, where speed, accuracy, and security meet in one place.
about_app.feature_smart_booking_desc: Your appointment is confirmed in seconds.
about_app.feature_precise_search_desc: Find your ideal doctor by specialty and location.
about_app.feature_auto_reminder_desc: We take care of your appointment and always remind you.
about_app.feature_simplicity_desc: An easy-to-use interface that puts your health at your fingertips.
about_app.slogan: Your time matters... Your health is our goal

contact_us.title: Help & Support
contact_us.working_hours_details:
Saturday - Thursday: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM
Friday: 2:00 PM - 10:00 PM
contact_us.form_desc: You can contact us directly by filling out the form below
contact_us.intro_desc: Fast Booking is your easiest digital gateway to access top-tier doctors in the Kingdom. We exist to shorten your wait time and elevate your healthcare experience in line with Vision 2030, where speed, accuracy, and security meet in one place.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy & Terms
privacy_policy.hero_subtitle: Your data is safe, your rights are protected üõ°Ô∏è
privacy_policy.intro_title: Your privacy is our top priority
privacy_policy.intro_desc: We believe trust is the foundation of healthcare. This policy aims to clearly explain how we collect and use your data with complete transparency, to ensure a safe and reliable experience that complies with approved regulations.
privacy_policy.disclaimer_purpose: Purpose: A technical intermediary for scheduling appointments and facilitating communication.
privacy_policy.disclaimer_advice: Not Medical Advice: Content is not a substitute for in-person consultation.
privacy_policy.disclaimer_emergency: Emergency: Please go directly to a hospital in case of emergencies.
privacy_policy.disclaimer_liability: Liability: Full medical responsibility lies with the doctor/clinic.
privacy_policy.privacy_item_1_content:
‚Ä¢ User Data: Name, phone number, email address.
‚Ä¢ Medical Data: Appointment communications, uploaded medical history (for doctor's review only).
‚Ä¢ Geographic Location: To identify clinics near you (with your consent).
privacy_policy.privacy_item_2_content:
‚Ä¢ To organize and book appointments between patients and clinics.
‚Ä¢ To send appointment reminders.
‚Ä¢ To improve service quality and user experience.
privacy_policy.privacy_item_3_content:
‚Ä¢ We do not sell your data to any advertising parties.
‚Ä¢ Your medical data is shared only with the clinic you choose to book with.
privacy_policy.privacy_item_4_content: We use advanced encryption technologies to protect your medical records and personal information from unauthorized access.
privacy_policy.privacy_item_5_content: Users have the right to delete their account and data at any time through the app settings.

clinic_app_details.about_description: We provide comprehensive medical care using the latest technologies. Our team of Saudi and international consultants is ready to serve you around the clock. We accept most insurance companies.

doctor_details.about_bio: Dr. Sara Al-Ali is a specialist consultant in ear, nose and throat diseases, currently working at Al-Amal Hospital. She has extensive experience spanning over 10 years in diagnosing and treating complex cases.
doctor_details.address: King Fahd Road, Al-Olya District, Riyadh 12345, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
doctor_details.about_desc: Dr. Sara Al-Ali is a specialist consultant in ear, nose and throat diseases, currently working at Al-Amal Hospital. She has extensive experience spanning over 10 years in diagnosing and treating complex cases.
